title: Hunting Shortbow
content:
Hunting Shortbow Uncommon 2~7 Damage 1d6+1Piercing Feller of Monsters: You have Advantage against Monstrousity type enemies. Weapon Enchantment +1 Hunter's Mark Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Supple and strong, this shortbow has been imbued with a ranger's solemn magic â€” running your fingers along the smooth ash, you cart feel that solemnity like a ghost in the shaped wood.
